description: This is the latest version of my free and community-driven resource designed to help individuals across Canada navigate legal name, gender marker, and I.D. changes. The site launched in December 2025.
This is a website for True History Brewing, a brewery and taproom located in Toronto. The site was originally launched in March 2024, with a full redesign completed in October 2025.
This is a portfolio website for Andrea Lynn Ferguson, registered psychotherapist (qualifying). The project was completed between May and June 2025.

This is a portfolio website for Tony Matthews, a producer and studio leader specializing in animation, digital media, and immersive storytelling. The site was designed and developed from March to June 2025.
This is a portfolio website for Ryan Perks, a professional book editor. The project was completed between December 2024 and February 2025.
This is a portfolio website for Hazel Henry, a rock music producer based in Portland, Oregon. The site was designed and built between January and April 2025.
This is a portfolio website for Poe M. Allphin, a PhD student in musicology and adjunct lecturer at CUNY. The project was completed between February and April 2025.
This is a website for Connect Fund, a non-profit organization supporting healthcare for 2SLGBTQ+ communities in Canada. The site launched in summer 2024, with ongoing updates and design support.
This is a portfolio website for Michael Cloud Duguay, a composer, producer, and accordionist. The site was designed and developed in 2024.
This is a portfolio website for Nina Milanovski, a dance artist and producer. The project was completed between February and March 2024.
This is a website for Sydney Gautreauâ€™s editing and writing coaching business. The original site was completed in 2022, with upgrades in 2023 and 2024.
